hooks.command: input=$(cat); file=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty'); [ -z "$file" ] && exit 0; [ ! -f "$file" ] && exit 0; ext="${file##*.}"; case "$ext" in py) command -v ruff >/dev/null 2>&1 && ruff format --quiet "$file" 2>/dev/null && ruff check --fix --quiet "$file" 2>/dev/null; ;; js|jsx|ts|tsx) command -v prettier >/dev/null 2>&1 && prettier --write --log-level=silent "$file" 2>/dev/null; ;; go) command -v gofmt >/dev/null 2>&1 && gofmt -w "$file" 2>/dev/null; ;; rs) command -v rustfmt >/dev/null 2>&1 && rustfmt --quiet "$file" 2>/dev/null; ;; esac; exit 0
